title: Arista Networks | Bangalore | compensation
content:
Education: B Tech in CSE IIT
Years of Experience: 3 years 3 months
Prior Experience: SDE2 at Product Based Non FAANG Company
Company: Arista Networks
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore, India
Previous CTC : 29 Lakhs + 3.5 Lakhs (Bonus) =32.5
Offered : 
Base:-30 Lakhs 
Retirals:-2.5 
Signing Bonus: 3 Lakhs (Anniversary)
Stock bonus: $25K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 40 Lakhs
Benefits: 18 paid vacation days + 12 paid sick leave days + 11 National holidays

I have interviews in pipeline at Google and amazon. No competing offers yet .
I am hoping for 30% increment in base and rest are fine

title: Offer Evaluation | Senior SDET | Akamai vs IBM Storage vs Qlik
content:
Education: B-Tech, Tier 3, Electronics Engg.
Years of Experience: 8 Years 9 Months
Prior Experience: Product Based MNC
Prior Base : 23.5, Variable 3.70 Lakhs, RSU: 84k for 4 years
Total : ~45 LPA

Date of the Offer: August 2024
Company: Akamai
Title/Level: Senior SDET
Location: Flex (Bangalore, Remote)
Base Salary: 31.97 LPA (Includes 12% PF)
Variable: 15 % (4.79 Lakhs)
Signing Bonus: 3 Lakhs
Stock : $40K stock grant vested over 4 years equally
Total comp (1st Year) : ~48 LPA
Total comp (2st Year Onwards) : ~45 LPA
Benefits: Remote Option, 27 paid vacation days + 12 paid holidays + 30 k wellness allowance + wifi reimbursement, meal coupons, Insurance upto 5 members, education allowance 2 Lakhs.
Interview Info : Had bad day in Last coding round.


Date of the Offer: July 2024
Company: IBM Storage
Title/Level: Senior QE, B7
Location: Pune Hybrid (3 Days Office)
Base Salary: 34.6 LPA 
Retirals: 2.46 Lakhs (PF+ Gratuity)
Signing Bonus: N/A
Stock bonus:N/A
Total comp : 37 LPA
Benefits: Hybrid 3 Days a week, 24 paid vacation days + Insurance of 4 Lakhs for immediate family.
Interview Feedback : Easy, All rounds were good.


Date of the Offer: August 2024
Company: Qlik
Title/Level: Senior SDET
Location: Permanent Remote
Salary: 30 LPA FIxed (12% PF included)
Signing Bonus: N/A
Stock bonus:N/A
Total comp : 30 LPA
Interview Info : Easy, All rounds were good.


I am currently looking for stability, and better work life balance, need help here which one to opt?

title: Salesforce | SMTS | Offer | 4 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier 3 
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: SDE 2 at Microsoft
Prev Comp - 34 L base + 70 K USD stocks over 4 years equally vested + 20 % bonus = 55.8 LPA

Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 42 LPA
Relocation Bonus: 3 L
Stock bonus: 75K USD vested equally over 4 years
Bonus: 10% of base
Total comp (Base Salary + Bonus + Stock): 42 + 4.2 + 16 + 3 = 65.2 LPA

General Salesforce benefits.

title: Accenture | Packaged App Development Senior Analyst
content:
Education: Bachelors in CSE Tier 3
Years of Experience: 1.7 yrs @Startup
Date of the Offer: 2024 August
Company: Accenture
Title/Level: Application Developer Senior Analyst
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 1280000 INR
Relocation: NA
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 21% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~1548000 INR
Benefits: Health Insurance + Gratuity + Stocks @15% discount for 10 percent of fixed Comp minimum 150000
Current CTC - 670000 | No Stock | No Bonus | Health Insurance upto 3lac
Other details: Another Offer From a Startup in Mumbai 1150000 Base pay  | No Stock | No Bonus | Health Insurance upto 5 lac
Asked accenture to change the location to Mumbai if not will join the startup any idea does accenture changes the location ?

title: AMD | Intern | Bangalore
content:
* Education: B. Tech in Computer Science from IIT
* Years of Experience: 0
* Prior Experience: N/A
* Date of the Offer: May, 2024
* Company: AMD (Advanced Micro Devices, Inc.)
* Title/Level: Intern (Software)
* Location: Bangalore, India
* Salary: ₹80,000 per month
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: N/A
* Stock bonus: N/A
* Bonus: N/A
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹80,000 per month
* Benefits: A box of goodies
* Other details: On-campus offer. This is a summer internship(AMD summer scholarship program) that they introduced for the first time this year, unlike the semester internship offers they usually provide. This offer is exclusively for a few IITs and IISc.
